section.title: From OTRS 6 to 7
section.para: This section lists changes that you need to examine when porting your package from OTRS 6 to 7.

section.title: Sessions always require cookies
section.para: Starting from OTRS 7, sessions always require cookies to be enabled. Therefore, the SessionIDCookie value was removed from LayoutObject, Templates and JavaScript. It is no longer necessary to append session variables to URLs or HTTP request payloads.
